<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_869126_empobsys_employee</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Mandatory Field Check 2</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    var applicationStatus = current.getValue('application_state');
    var addedSkillsAndWorkExperience = current.getValue('added_skills_and_work_experience');

    if (applicationStatus == 'saved' && addedSkillsAndWorkExperience == '0') {
        gs.addErrorMessage("Please answer mandatory field 'Added Skills and Work Experience?'");
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-18 12:14:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8b51eed28384121066f5f4a6feaad3f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mandatory Field Check 2</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Employee Onboarding System" source="x_869126_empobsys">88e438f18300121066f5f4a6feaad3a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Onboarding System">88e438f18300121066f5f4a6feaad3a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8b51eed28384121066f5f4a6feaad3f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-18 12:19:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8b51eed28384121066f5f4a6feaad3f0"/></record_update>
